name: Dealing with Bugs
description:
A friend and I made this game in for the itch.io Game Jam of 2021.

You're a computer programmer fixing bugs in your code, so you manually dive into the computer to fix some errors, and bugs.

Q and E are to switch between basic (white), shotgun (purple), and sniper (orange) ammo.

Also here's the github if you wanna take a look: https://github.com/phelixxthecat/Bug-Game-Jam

And the fine gentleman who lent us the music for the game:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCht-mk9c5szqvmlGBGftc3A
